Eiffel Tower: Continue down the road past the Sushi Yako
Take a right after Bir Hakeim
Take a right at 2 three wheeled bikes
Take the right path at the pond
The Colosseum: Go the wrong way down the one way
Get to the opposite side of the Colosseum
When you get close to a small white van go towards the gate
Continue down the hall to the overlook
Sydney Opera House: Move towards the statue down the road and take a left at right before it
When you get to the far side of the fountain continue to the back side of the Opera House
Leaning Tower of Pisa: Go through the vendor stalls and under the arch
Big Ben: Go towards the construction site and go to the right
Go down the alley past the orange vans
Take a right at the bike against a fence
Golden Gate Bridge: Follow the road up the hill
Palace of Versailles: Take a right at Big Fernand
When you see the Carre Aux Herbes sign turn left
Go towards the statue of the house being ridden
Chichen Itza: Move away from the pepsi sign
At the tiki hut turn right
